scripts.dev__w: bun x dotenv-cli -e dev.env -- cmd /C 'next dev -p %WEB_PORT% --turbo --experimental-https'
scripts.dev__o: bun x dotenv-cli -e dev.env -- cmd /C 'minio server -S ./certificates %MINIO_DB_PATH%'
scripts.dev__o:migrate: bun x dotenv-cli -e dev.env -- cmd /C 'bun run src/o/migrate.ts'
scripts.dev__r:migrate: bun x dotenv-cli -e dev.env -- cmd /C 'bun run src/r/migrate.ts'
scripts.build: bun x dotenv-cli -e prod.env -- cmd /C 'next build'
scripts.prod__w: bun x dotenv-cli -e prod.env -- cmd /C 'next start -p %WEB_PORT%'
scripts.prod__o: bun x dotenv-cli -e prod.env -- cmd /C 'minio server -S ./certificates %MINIO_DB_PATH%'
scripts.prod__o:migrate: bun x dotenv-cli -e prod.env -- cmd /C 'bun run src/o/migrate.ts'
scripts.prod__r:migrate: bun x dotenv-cli -e prod.env -- cmd /C 'bun run src/r/migrate.ts'
scripts.test: bun x dotenv-cli -e dev.env -- cmd /C 'bun run test/test.ts
